# Audio

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/content/Audio" symbolName="Audio" /> Audio

Audio content for a message.

Audio can be included in messages for voice or sound-based interactions.


**Alias to:** `mirascope_v2_llm.content.Audio`
